import sys

def main():
    x = int(input())
    temp = (x+1)//2
    print(temp)

def __starting_point():
    main()
__starting_point()

#A1
def main():
    from sys import stdin,stdout
    from math import ceil
    stdout.write(str(ceil(int(stdin.readline())/2)))
def __starting_point():
    main()

__starting_point()

import math
N = int(input())
num = math.ceil(N/2)
print(num)
